location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Circled serial numbers (red for received correspondence; blue/black for issued correspondence) refer to entries in the notes at the rear of the file.

Foliation: the system in use appears in pencil, circled, at the top right hand corner of each folio. The foliation begins at the front cover and ends with the back cover. An earlier, uncircled pencil foliation sequence also occurs in the top right hand corner of each folio, numbered 32-239 (f.12-f.191).

mods.abstract: The file includes papers recording the handing over of duties from one Political Agent to another; circular letters announcing the handovers, sent to British officials in the Persian Gulf region; letters in Arabic to various Gulf heads of state, including the Ruler of Bahrain, announcing changeovers of Political Agents, and replies in Arabic with English translations; closing pay statements; grants of leave; and related papers.
